en_question: A tank initially contains \(1376\) L of water with \(18\) kg of sugar dissolved in it. Sugar syrup containing \(0.26\) kg/L of sugar is pumped into the tank at a rate of \(9\) L/min, and the well-mixed solution exits the tank at the same rate to maintain its volume. How many kilograms of sugar are left in the tank after one and a half hours (92 minutes)? Provide your answer to five significant figures.
